attributes.action: request the Queen to dissolve parliament so that a general election can be held before the summer recess in 2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current parliament has been completely discredited by the scandal over MPs' expenses. The only way to start to restore confidence in our parliamentary system of government is to hold a general election so that those members elected will have a new mandate from the electorate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
